CATEGORIES_DESCRIPTION.ADMINISTRATION: Commands that manage or modify important parameters of the server or a user.
CATEGORIES_DESCRIPTION.FUN: Funny commands like memes among other things.
CATEGORIES_DESCRIPTION.GAME_STATISTICS: Commands to extract the statistics of a player in a certain game.
CATEGORIES_DESCRIPTION.GAMES: Commands with minigames to pass the time.
CATEGORIES_DESCRIPTION.MISCELLANEOUS: Commands that cannot be categorized elsewhere. You'll find everything.
CATEGORIES_DESCRIPTION.MODERATION: Commands to manage moderation of users.

MULTIPLE_COMMANDS: Multiple commands with the same name have been found. Select the command you want to consult below.
SELECT_A_COMMAND: Select the command you want to consult.
SELECT_A_CATEGORY: Select the category you want to consult.
COMMAND_SELECTED: You have successfully selected the command.

ADMINISTRATION.NICKNAME: Manage the nickname of a user
ADMINISTRATION.ROLE: Manage the roles of a user

ANIMALS.BIRDS: Send a image of birds to the channel
ANIMALS.MAMMALS: Send a image of mammals to the channel
ANIMALS.REPTILES: Send a image of reptiles to the channel

ANIME.COFFEE: Send a random gif of a coffee
ANIME.FOOD: Send a random gif of a food
ANIME.GECG: Send a random image of a gecg
ANIME.GENSHIN-IMPACT: Send a random Genshin Impact wallpaper
ANIME.INTERACTION: Interact with other users with gifs and actions
ANIME.HUSBAND: Send a random image of a husband
ANIME.NEKO: Send a random image of a neko
ANIME.REACTION: React to other users using gifs
ANIME.TRAP: Send a random image of a trap
ANIME.WAIFU: Send a random image of a waifu

CORE.CLUSTER: Get information about the current Filo's cluster
CORE.COMMANDS: Get the list of bot commands or information about a command
CORE.DISCORD: Get the link to Filo's Discord Server
CORE.DONATE: Get information about donations for the bot
CORE.FLAGS: Show your flags or that of another specific user
CORE.GITHUB: Get the link to Filo's GitHub
CORE.HELP: Get basic help on the bot
CORE.PING: Get the latency from Filo and from the Discord API
CORE.PRIVACY: Get the link to Filo's Privacy Policy
CORE.ROLES: Manage roles in an advanced way
CORE.STATUS: Get the link to Filo's Status
CORE.SETUP: Configure the modules and behavior of Filo
CORE.SUPPORT: Get information on how to receive support
CORE.TERMS: Get the link to Filo's Terms and Conditions
CORE.TWITTER: Get the link to Filo's Twitter
CORE.VOTE: Get the link to Filo's voting pages
CORE.VOTES: Get the vote counter of all Filo's voting pages
CORE.WEBSITE: Get the link to Filo's Website
CORE.WIKI: Get the link to Filo's Wiki

ECONOMY.CREDITS: Get your current credits or a user's credits
ECONOMY.DAILY: Claim your daily credits or gift them to a user
ECONOMY.PAY: Pay an amount of credits to another user

FUN.8BALL: Ask the 8 ball a question and it will answer you wisely
FUN.CHUCKNORRIS: Send a Chuck Norris meme to the current channel
FUN.DRAKE: Send a Drake meme to the current channel
FUN.JOKE: Send a random joke to the current channel
FUN.LOVE: Send an image showing the love you have with another user to the current channel
FUN.MEME: Send a random meme to the current channel

GAME_STATISTICS.CSGO: Watch the statistics of a CSGO player
GAME_STATISTICS.FORTNITE: Watch the statistics of a Fortnite player
GAME_STATISTICS.OSU: Watch the statistics of a osu! player
GAME_STATISTICS.R6S: Watch the statistics of a R6S player

MISCELLANEOUS.ASCII: Convert your text to ASCII text
MISCELLANEOUS.AVATAR: Show your avatar or that of a user
MISCELLANEOUS.FORTNITE-STORE: Get a random item from the Fortnite store
MISCELLANEOUS.LYRICS: Get the lyrics of a song
MISCELLANEOUS.POLL: Create a poll on the current channel
MISCELLANEOUS.RANDOM-COLOR: Get the basic information of a random color
MISCELLANEOUS.WEATHER: Get the weather of a location

MODERATION.BAN: Permanently ban a user from the server
MODERATION.KICK: Kick a user from the server
MODERATION.MUTE: Permanently mute a user from the server
MODERATION.SOFTBAN: Soft ban a user from the server
MODERATION.TEMPBAN: Temporarily ban a user from the server.
MODERATION.TEMPMUTE: Temporarily mute a user from the server
MODERATION.UNBAN: Remove the ban from a user
MODERATION.UNMUTE: Remove the mute from a user
MODERATION.UNWARN: Remove a warn from a user
MODERATION.WARN: Warn a user from the server

SERVER.ACTIVITY: Start an activity on a voice channel
SERVER.CHANNEL: Get the information of a channel
SERVER.INVITE: Generate an invite for a channel
SERVER.NEWS: Follow or get information about our news channels
SERVER.REPORT: Report user behavior to a server moderator
SERVER.ROLE: Get the information of a role

SETTINGS.ANTI-BAD-WORDS: Module that allows you to sanction users who send bad words
SETTINGS.ANTI-EVASION: Module that allows you to ban those users who try to evade an active sanction
SETTINGS.ANTI-EXTERNAL-LINKS: Module that allows you to sanction users who send links
SETTINGS.ANTI-INVITES: Module that allows you to sanction users who send invites from other servers
SETTINGS.ANTI-MASS-MENTIONS: Module that allows you to sanction that users mention too many users
SETTINGS.ANTI-REPEATED-TEXT: Module that allows you to sanction users who send repeated text in the message
SETTINGS.ANTI-SPAM: Module that allows you to avoid spam from users
SETTINGS.AUTO-MODERATION: Module that allows you to automatically sanction users with a certain amount of warnings
SETTINGS.COMMANDS: Manage Filo's commands by enabling or disabling them
SETTINGS.FAREWELLS: Module that allows you to send a goodbye message to old members
SETTINGS.LANGUAGE: Module that allows you to set the Filo's Language
SETTINGS.LOGGING: Module that allows to send the logs of the server to a channel
SETTINGS.MEMBER-COUNTER: Module that allows configuring a channel as a server member counter
SETTINGS.REPORTS: Module that allows users to report bad behavior to the Moderators of the server
SETTINGS.WELCOMES: Welcome module that allows you to send a message to new members and assign them a role

SOCIAL.PROFILE: Get your profile or a user's profile

UTILITIES.BINARY: Encode binary or decode binary code
UTILITIES.MORSE: Encode morse or decode morse code

ONLY_IN_A_SERVER: This command can only be executed on a server.
